name: On The Spot!
description:
He's literally rollin' though.

Description

Wear sides of an obsessive-compulsive dice while puzzling through epic levels but watch out: the floor is numbers!

Commands Key Usage TAB Opens Menu WASD - Arrows Lets you move around MOUSE Rotates the camera Context

Puzzle game made by two members of  Stampede Games for the GMTK Game jam 2022.

  • Theme: Roll of the Dice!
  • Duration: From 15 to 17 July 2022 for a total of 48 hours.
  • Made with UE 4.23 by two people.
Credits
  • Stampede Games as game designers artists and developers.
  • NikiNPhaser,  Sound-Ideas, prosoundfx for sound effetcs and music.
